ygData.subject: Re: AC & Agility
ygData.msgSnippet: Keep the AC 6 bracers and lose the Serpentine. The bonuses are trivial to your proc rate (unless they are tremendous bonuses) and it s not worth losing the AC
ygData.messageBody:
Keep the AC 6 bracers and lose the Serpentine. The bonuses are trivial
to your proc rate (unless they are tremendous bonuses) and it's not
worth losing the AC over.

Agility measures how fast you can increase your defensive skills, and
adds a little AC. Being a Ranger you should have a pretty high AGI
score anyway. Again, the bonuses aren't worth the loss of AC.

The only exception would be if you need to get a stat over a hump,
e.g. getting an attribute to over 75 or 100 or 200. Even then, it's a
hard argument to lose AC.

--- In theeverquesttavern@y..., myrlok wrote:
> Okay folks, I just got two I think they were
> serpentine bracers (AC 1 Dex +2?maybe 3, Agility +9) Well my
> ranger has two bracers at the moment with 6ac a piece.
> When I put on my new bracers I loose a lot of AC. I
> want to know since agility means less hits and damage,
> whether or not loosing this AC is a bad thing or will my
> new agility help out more?<br><br>Kinda confused.
> Tried both ways against the same conned creature and it
> seemed with new bracers i got hit more. Please help
> out.<br><br>Mykeal<br>Ranger of the 17th season in worship of our
magnificant
> Lady Tunare.
